title: Trader Who Bet $1B on Bitcoin, Returns With 3x Leveraged Long on Aster
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: James Wynn's new trade comes just days after being liquidated on the same token, as he believes ASTER's airdrop will be one of the biggest in crypto history.
